Services Offered Custom Chatbot Development (RAG, LLM-Based) AI Automation Integrations (API-based, workflow automation) Predictive Analytics & Data Modeling Fine-tuning and Prompt Engineering AI-powered dashboard integrations Consultation on AI architecture and deployment Timings & Availability Fatima is available Monday to Saturday from 10 AM – 7 PM (GMT+5). Urgent consultations may be scheduled outside regular hours upon request. Charges Initial Consultation: Free (15 minutes) AI Chatbot Development: Starting from $200 Automation Workflows: $50–$150 depending on complexity Custom ML Models: Starting from $300 Monthly Maintenance: $30–$70 Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) 1. How long does it take to develop an AI chatbot? Typical development time is 3–7 days depending on requireme
